messageText: thank you again for all the time spent on my brows, i'm seriously so obsessed with how they turned out! you're amazing!! 🥰
It was a huge brow transformation for you love! Can't wait to see the healed results 🥰😍
Its going well [my friend] said they looked healed already and im in love with them, just like when i had got my arm tattoo it healed quicker than i thought
It takes about 7-14 days! So just make sure it's completely healed. It looks like your brows are almost done but not yet. 😊
Im so excited about them lol im getting ALOT of compliments thank you Kelly ❤️❤️💞💞

Thank you so much Kelly I love my eyebrows! You're the best! I never thought I was ever gona achieve the ombré look because of how dark my eyebrows are but you made it work and I love it! I've never been so obsessed with my eyebrows 🥰🥰
You're welcome Patricia! 😊 I barely touched your front so it could look more ombré. Looks super BOMB on you! Thank you for choosing me. 🥰
Yes I love them! Thank you Kelly for making me look like a bad b***! 🔥
